step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Keep that arm straight and feel the gentle resistance as instructed.
Excellent! You're opening your hand and fingers wide, which is key for this step. Keep up the good work.
Well done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. This is exactly what we want to see.
Fantastic! You're opening your hand and relaxing your muscles as you exhale. Keep visualizing that fluid moving.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and focus on opening and closing your hand with each breath. This helps move fluid effectively.
